title: Free Champions until Level 6?
body:
Hello, everyone.
I've only been playing for about 3 days now, and I'm only lvl 3.
So, I was just wondering what could the best champion you have for free until lvl 6.


Thanks!

replies.body: Welcome to League!  There isn't necessarily a best champion, but what's best for you.  For now, you will have a small set of champions to try out until level 5.  Once you reach level 5, your champion pool will switch to the [free champion rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation).  Feel free to explore and discover the best fit for you.  Good luck!

Depends what you are looking for!  If you want a champion that is relatively easy to learn and play I recommend playing Garen {{champion:86}}  in the top lane.  He is very forgiving and does a lot of damage.  He is also very cheap to pick up permanently after you get past lvl 6. 

If you are looking for a champion that will be good when you get to lvl 30 you could try learning Jinx {{champion:222}} .  Jinx is an adc played in the bot lane.   She will take a lot of practice to be good with in P v P but she can do tons of damage and win you games when you get more experienced.

If you are looking for a champion that is fun to play I recommend Lux{{champion:99}} .  She is a mage played in the mid lane and can hit enemies from really far away and has a very fun low cooldown ultimate.  She was one of my favorite champions when I was new to the game.

I recommend avoiding Kha'zix {{champion:121}}  and Ryze {{champion:13}}  until you are higher level as they are relatively difficult champions.
If you want, you could also divide them into groups(tank, mage, ranged, etc.,)
